spec_data.Name: the-new-hotness
spec_data.Description:
Fedmsg consumer that listens to Anitya and files bugzilla bugs in response
(to notify packagers that they can update their packages).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 09:45:30 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Consume Anitya fedmsg messages to file bugzilla bugs
